Package database

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseService
public class DatabaseService
extends java.lang.Object
This abstracts and manages all communication with the database. All returned rows are represented with models to make for a easy dev experience.
Since:
2020-03-14
Version:
0.1
Author:
OliverEkberg and JesperAnnefors

    • hasTimeReport

      public boolean hasTimeReport​(int week, int year, int userId, int projectId)
      Checks if a time report exists for the given parameters
      Parameters:
      week - The specific week the time report applies to
      year - The specific year the time report applies to
      userId - The unique identifier of the user to find time reports for
      projectId - The unique identifier of the project to find time reports for
      Returns:
      True if the time report exists, otherwise False

    • getStatistics

      private Statistic getStatistics​(java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to, DatabaseService.StatisticType type, int projectId, int userId, int roleId)
      Gets statistics of the total minutes put in a project between two dates based on all users in the project, a specific user in the project or a specific role in the project.
      Parameters:
      from - Is the start date to gather the data from.
      to - Is the end date to gather the data from.
      type - Is the type of data to gather. From all users, a specific user or a specific role.
      projectId - Is the unique identifier for Project.
      userId - Is the unique identifier for User. Only needed when showing data for a specific user.
      roleId - Is the unique identifier for Role. Only needed when showing data for a specific role.
      Returns:
      This returns statistics for all users in a project, a specific user in a project or a specific role in a project.

    • getActivityStatistics

      public Statistic getActivityStatistics​(int projectId, java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to)
      Gets statistics of the total minutes put in a project between two dates based on all users in the project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - Is the unique identifier for Project.
      from - Is the start date to gather the data from.
      to - Is the end date to gather the data from.
      Returns:
      This returns statistics for all users in a project.

    • getActivityStatistics

      public Statistic getActivityStatistics​(int projectId, int userId, java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to)
      Gets statistics of the total minutes put in a project between two dates based on a specific user in the project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - Is the unique identifier for Project.
      userId - Is the unique identifier for User.
      from - Is the start date to gather the data from.
      to - Is the end date to gather the data from.
      Returns:
      This returns statistics for a specific user in a project.

    • getRoleStatistics

      public Statistic getRoleStatistics​(int projectId, int roleId, java.time.LocalDate from, java.time.LocalDate to)
      Gets statistics of the total minutes put in a project between two dates based on a specific role in the project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - Is the unique identifier for Project.
      roleId - Is the unique identifier for Role.
      from - Is the start date to gather the data from.
      to - Is the end date to gather the data from.
      Returns:
      This returns statistics for a specific role in a project.
